thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 732
thread.title: Sonia Powell
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Sonia Powell

author: Sonia Powell
title: Sonia Powell
text: Hi, to be honest I've never hired from you, but I will no longer hire from anyone else but you! Your staff are amazing, one gentleman in particular today helped me and my two daughters in the pouring rain to get from budget car return to qantas check in desk! And on the way my daughter realised she'd left her acorn nuts in the car, this amazing guy went back and got them for her and found us in the departure area!! Amazing and thank you! You e got yourselves some new loyal customers!
